Title: 37759 - # Tips to Increase Your Phone's Available Memory
Direction: 675 words. Make a list of 4 to 8 tips people can follow to increase the available memory in their smartphones. Some tips mentioned in the resource links include removing apps you do not need and limiting the number of widgets you use. You can include the client link and keyword in a section about using microSD cards to cellphones to boost memory. Don't include tips about rooting the smartphone since this can void warranties. Your target audience is interested technology.
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: adding a microSD to T-mobile's LG G4

Title: 37760 - # Ways You Didn't Know Your Cellphone Could Make You Money
Direction: 675 words. Make a list of 4 to 8 ways people can earn money by using their cellphones. There are a lot of apps that will help people make money by selling pictures, completing simple tasks, etc. You can also mention selling or recycling old phones for money. You can include the client URL and keyword by mentioning how a cellphone with an exceptional camera will make it easier to sell pictures (or something similar that highlights one of the S6 edge's key features). Your target audience is interested in a range of topics surrounding the internet, tech, and making money.
Anchor Text: galaxy s6 edge- unrelated keyword (this could be “more information”, “click here”)
